mapper.insert: INSERT INTO partnership_member( partnership_idx, partnership_team_idx, member_idx, partnership_position_idx, manager_cd, state_cd, profile_image_url, profile_image_path, disable_functions, update_date, create_date ) VALUES ( #{partnershipIdx}, #{partnershipTeamIdx}, #{memberIdx}, #{partnershipPositionIdx}, #{managerCd}, #{stateCd}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{profileImagePath}, #{disableFunctions}, now(), now() )
